name: Realities Adrift - An Anime RPG
description:
“What is reality, anyway?” - You are a Realmwalker, someone who can safely visit and defend other realities from threats both inside and outside of that world. 

Realmwalkers aren't the only people with this ability though, Voidsworn, people who want to unmake reality, also have this ability and will do anything to achieve their goals. 

Defend against Voidsworn, help the people of the realities you are in, and keep your hub safe, but as with everything, not all is as it seems… 

The aim is for the story to be engaging on multiple levels while taking advantage of the “different realities” mechanics without getting too complicated. The way we aim to do this is with a “show, don't tell” approach to explaining the mechanics and using more abstract metaphors & magic over pseudoscience to explain the universe. 

Different realities will have their own lore and issues, so the player can explore all these different worlds while still knowing it all adds up to major plot points, which should keep the player engaged. This also allows for us to make major environmental changes when things start to look stale with in-universe explanations.

[Very much a WIP - above is the current "sales" copy for the game which needs as much work as the game does right now. Currently 2 working classes in-game with 2 basic zones to show the premise. More classes and content are on the way!]
